text: [MUSIC PLAYING]

Driving positive impact
isn't an individual sprint.
It's a relay.

And continuing this race
is my purpose in life.

Taking the baton from
my mentors and turning

their brave teachings into
ambitious concrete solutions

to inspire those around us
to drive positive change
is my finish line.

Leveraging my experience
in innovation, and climate,

and sustainability, I help
today's business leaders

to accelerate their
journey towards net

positivity, sustainable
supply chains,

and to implement disruptive
climate technologies

to effectively align
profit and purpose.

That is the true essence
of the team member

I aspire to be to run this
relay for my community,

future organizations,
and the environment.
I'm now at the starting blocks.

And with me are my friends,
section mates, and colleagues.
And we're all so excited to run.

Echoing Mary
Oliver's words, this

is "one wild and precious"
race, and it has just begun.
That is my purpose in life.

That is why I won't
drop the baton.
[MUSIC PLAYING]
